Mef je moral najeti minibus
07 Nov 2019, 06:01 by Andraž Gombač

“V Ljubljano nas gre nastopat toliko, da sem moral najeti minibus,” pravi kantavtor Drago Mislej - Mef, ki bo na posebnem koncertu v nedeljo ob 19. uri v Linhartovi dvorani Cankarjevega doma z dvema bendoma in glasbenimi gosti predstavil svoj novi album Ma ne že spet ... Mef.



Drago Mislej - Mef (v sredini) že več let nastopa z akustičnim, od predlani pa tudi z mladim električnim Narodnoosvobodilnim bendom. 

IZOLA, LJUBLJANA > Izidu cedeja so poleti sledili koncerti v Kopru, Kanalu ob Soči, Idriji in Podragi. “Zdaj pa imamo program, zaradi katerega je to že kar nekakšna gledališka predstava. Potruditi se bom moral, da bom vse skupaj obvladoval,” pravi Drago Mislej - Mef.
Na nedeljskem koncertu v Cankarjevem domu bo svoj raskavi vokal spremljal z brenkanjem po akustični kitari, ob njem pa se bosta izmenjala tako akustični kakor električni Narodnoosvobodilni bend (NOB). V prvem sta kitarist Armando Šturman in basistGorast Radojevič, v drugem pa kitarist Marko Tomič, basist Jaša Hedžet, bobnar Gregor Brajkovič, klaviaturist Jadran Ferjančič in pevka Eva Brajkovič.
Nastopilo bo tudi veliko gostov: pri pesmih Čez mreže in žice in Ja pa ja bo zapelo deset članic Mladinskega pevskega zbor Glasbene šole Koper pod vodstvom Maje Cilenšek, pevka Marina Martensson bo duet z Mefom Pot domov prvič izvedla ob spremljavi benda, ne samo svoje akustične kitare. Na “slide” kitaro bo med pesmijo Greva na postajo zaigral Tržačan Matteo E. Basta, ob njem bo basist Giorgio Biselli, ki ga slišimo že na Mefovem prejšnjem albumu Najboljša leta (2013), pri pesmih Bel papir in Ervin pa bosta ob čelistki Mary Servatius - Milanič zaigrali odlični mladi violinistki Maša Stopar in Nika Gačnik. Za miksanje bo skrbel producent Andrea F.
Koncerta ne bo samo slišati, ampak tudi videti - filmski scenograf Dušan Milavec bo oder opremil s slikami, ki jih je ustvaril Eduard Belsky, v Ukrajini rojen in akademsko izšolan ter v Izolo priseljen umetnik. Za oblikovanje luči in svetlobne učinke bo poskrbel Loris Vižintin, za videoprojekcije pa mojster eksperimentalnega filma Davorin Marc.
Na koncertu se bo v dveh urah in pol zvrstilo vseh 13 pesmi z novega in izbor pesmi s prejšnjih albumov, napoveduje Mef. “Obstaja pa tudi resna nevarnost, da bomo šli v kratkem v studio posnet še štiri nove pesmi in po cedeju izdali tudi dvojni vinilni album, kakor smo načrtovali že na začetku,” dodaja.
Novih pesmi javnost še ne pozna. “Prav ponosen sem nanje,” pravi Mef. “So nekoliko bolj moderno narejene, radioheadovske s počenim glasom.”
Na albumu Ma ne že spet ... Mef se prepletajo bolj intimne in ostrejše angažirane, protestne. V kateri tabor sodijo te, ki so šele na poti v studio? “Niso ljubezenske. So osebne, a univerzalne, ne moje intimne izpovedi” pravi kantavtor.


Mef z akustičnim NOB: levo Armando Šturman, desno Gorast Radojevič

Mef had to rent a minibus
07 Nov 2019, 06:01 by Andraž Gombač

"There is so much going on us in Ljubljana that I had to rent a minibus," says singer-songwriter Drago Mislej - Mef, who will present his new album Ma ne at a special concert on Sunday at 7pm in Linhart Hall of Cankarjev dom with two bands and musical guests. again ... Mep.



Drago Mislej - Mef (in the middle) has been performing with the acoustic for many years, as well as with the young electric National Liberation Band from the day before.

IZOLA, LJUBLJANA> Concerts in Koper, Kanal near Soca, Idrija and Podrag followed in summer with the release of Cede. “But now we have a program that makes it a kind of theater performance. I'm going to have to do my best to control everything, "says Drago Mislej - Mef.
At a concert in Cankarjev dom on Sunday, he will accompany his cracking vocals by humming on an acoustic guitar, and both the acoustic and electric National Liberation Band (NOB) will alternate with him. The first is guitarist Armando Sturman and bassistGorast Radojevic, and the second is guitarist Marko Tomic, bassist Jasa Hedget, drummer Gregor Brajkovic, keyboardist Jadran Ferjancic and singer Eva Brajkovic.
Many guests will also perform: the songs Across the Network and the Wire and Yes will be sung by ten members of the Youth Choir of the Koper Music School under the direction of Maja Cilenšek, singer Marina Martensson will perform the duet with Mef Pot for the first time accompanied by the band, not only their acoustic guitars. The slide guitar will be played by Greyhound on the station with Matteo E. Basta from Trieste, accompanied by bassist Giorgio Biselli, already heard on Mef's previous album Best of the Year (2013), and with the songs White Paper and Ervin by the cellist Mary Servatius - Milanic played by excellent young violinists Masha Stopar and Nika Gacnik. Mixing will be handled by producer Andrea F.
The concert will not only be heard but also seen - the film set designer Dusan Milavec will equip the stage with paintings created by Eduard Belsky, a Ukrainian-born and academically educated artist and an immigrant artist in Izola. Light design and lighting effects will be provided by Loris Vizintin and video projections by the master of experimental film Davorin Marc.
The concert will feature all 13 songs from the new album and a selection of songs from previous albums in two and a half hours, Mef predicts. "But there is also a real danger that we will soon be recording four more songs in the studio and releasing a double vinyl album as we had planned at the beginning," he adds.
The public does not yet know the new songs. "I'm really proud of them," Mef says. "They are a bit more modern, radioheaded with a broken voice."
On the album Ma not again ... Mef is more intimate and sharper engaged, protesting. Which camp are those just on the way to the studio? “They are not amorous. They are personal, but universal, not my intimate confessions, ”says the singer-songwriter.
